extractedText: Data and AI What’s changing What you can do What you’ll achieve What’s trending Expand Menu What’s changing What you can do What you’ll achieve What’s trending Retail / Data and AI Prepare your data for the new generative AI era Bringing AI-powered solutions to transform retail. The generative AI era is here—and it’s driving change and growth opportunities across the retail industry. Data readiness is essential for using AI effectively. Many retailers are data-rich, but insights-poor due to functional silos. Learn how Accenture’s capabilities, such as ai.RETAIL, can help retailers get more out of their data by bringing strategy, AI and technology together for a single view of the customer and the enterprise. DATA Toggle accordion 75% of retail executives view generative AI as instrumental to their business’s revenue growth. 93% of retail CXOs are planning to scale up their investment in AI and generative AI over the next 3-5 years—in terms of time, money, and human capital 50% of all working hours across retail have the potential to be impacted by generative AI How data and AI is changing Retail leaders are proactively increasing their investments in generative AI, recognizing its potential to revolutionize every aspect of the industry—from inventory management to customer interaction. As this technology advances, it is crucial for retailers to adapt and innovate, ensuring they harness the full potential of AI to remain competitive and meet evolving consumer expectations. Retailers must act now to capitalize on this opportunity. What you can do Create one version of the truth Rely on a flexible, common data model that’s built for retail to provide a shared framework for developing all business use cases. Put the customer at the core Generate a 360-degree customer view with internal and external data. Analyze customer behavior and drive powerful personalization. Turn data into responsible actions Move fast with predictive, prescriptive insights and detailed scenario simulations. Test and learn more quickly to refine use cases. Empower all people with data An intuitive dashboard allows everyone to access data and understand their own role in reaching desired outcomes with recommended actions. Harness data as a competitive asset Use valuable customer data to generate new revenue streams by selling granular insights to suppliers that want to optimize to their offerings. What you’ll achieve Enhanced productivity across functions Unlock new levels of productivity and reduce costs across all areas of the business—from marketing to merchandising to supply chain and more. Accelerated growth and value Accelerate economic value, drive business growth and foster more creative, meaningful work for your people by tapping into new and emerging generative AI opportunities. Faster, better experiences Spark greater customer satisfaction and loyalty with generative AI. Deliver personalized interactions with quick and precise responses, streamlined processes, shorter wait times and better service. Knowledge-management transformation Enhance decision-making and make information more accessible with automated data organization. Generative AI can generate summaries, identify insights and even predict trends.
